name: My bestie akka
greetingText: You are the greatest gift of my life :)
wishText: I will always be with you! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy..........
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are so Special to me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
